fields.noEmptyString: Empty string value is not allowed
fields.rowsMax: Maximum number of rows of textarea
fields.rowsMin: Minimum number of rows of textarea
fields.useDisabledTextareaInViewMode: Use disabled textarea in view mode
fields.auditableEnabled: Log the change as a record activity
fields.recordRelatedChangesInStream: Record changes to related records for the current entity.

tooltips.foreignCode: This code name is used for the field created in the related entity for the backward relationship.
tooltips.foreignEntity: This is the related entity which records are referenced in the current field.
tooltips.relationName: This code is used to set the system name for the entity of type "Relation" that is automatically created.
tooltips.isMultilang: Automatic creation of fields via cloning the current one as many times as there are locales activated in the Multi-Languages Settings.
tooltips.required: Field will be mandatory. Can't be left empty.
tooltips.readOnly: The field value cannot be specified by the user. It is still possible to change it via the API.
tooltips.protected: The field value cannot be specified by the user. Neither via the front end nor via the API.
tooltips.pattern: To enable only capital letters with 10-symbol length use "/^[A-Z]{1,10}$/"
tooltips.default: Value will be set by default upon creating.
tooltips.isSorted: Options will be sorted after saving.
tooltips.dropdown: Do not use the dropdown if there are more than 300 options in the list.
tooltips.foreignName: Field to be shown in the relation.
tooltips.seeMoreDisabled: If not checked, long texts to be displayed will be shortened.
tooltips.lengthOfCut: Excessive characters will be hidden in the view mode.
tooltips.linkMultipleField: This option enables a handy way to edit relations. Don't use it if you can have a large number of related records.
tooltips.modifiedExtendedEnabled: Changes in this relation will cause the update of "Modified At" date and time.
tooltips.inheritanceDisabled: Values for this field will not be inherited from the parent item.
tooltips.modifiedExtendedDisabled: If set the changes in this field will not update the "Modified At" timestamp.
tooltips.auditableDisabled: Changes in this field are not displayed as Activity.

confirmations.resetToDefault: Are you sure you want to reset configuration to default?

exceptions.cannotAddRequiredFieldWithExistingRecord: You cannot add required field with existing records without default value
